announcements.details: Listen to the Homily for The Baptism of the Lord by Rev. Fr. James Gyekye Danso
announcements.title: Homily: The Baptism of the Lord

announcements.details: There will be TWO masses on Sunday, 19th January, 2025. Offertory will be led by St Vincent De Paul and the Wednesday borns respectively. Bidding Prayers will be led by the Lectors.
announcements.title: Mass Schedule: 2nd Sunday in Ordinary Time

announcements.details: The St Bakhita Marriage School will reopen early February, 2025. Prospective counselees who wish to have their marriages solemnized in 2025 should please pick up registration forms from the office of the Rector.
announcements.title: St Bakhita Marriage School

schedules.liturgicalWeek: First week in Ordinary Time, 12th-19th Jan

sacraments.details: Kindly contact the church office to register for Infant Baptism
sacraments.subtitle: First Saturday of every month, after Grotto Mass
sacraments.title: Infant Baptism

sacraments.subtitle: The St Bakhita Marriage School will reopen early February, 2025.
sacraments.title: Marriage School

sacraments.subtitle: By appointment with the priest in charge.
sacraments.title: Confession
